name: With thee In the Desert by Savad Monk

metadata.name: A perfect morning
metadata.description:
The cold desert is full of somber solitude, a great place to nurture our inner aspirations for peace and freedom.

About Empty Quarter - Star wars in the UAE

Situated at the edge of the United Arab Emirates' greatest desert region, Rub Al Khali (also known as the "Great Empty Quarter"), Liwa Oasis promises a completely unique experience.

Historically it was home to the Nahyan family, who were the leaders of the Abu Dhabi emirate along with the UAE. During this time and still to this day it remains a date-palm cultivating region for local Bedouin tribes, the most well known of these being the Bani Yas.

Also ,some of the scenes in Star Wars: The Force Awakens were shot from this place.
